Doc had taken up refuge under a rather small mangrove tree. A monkey

hematical feat. He heard the shuttle coming and came
out of his reverie the=
n.

He stood up, glistening in the rain, and walked over to Perseus.

Doc: =
Ah! There you are! Since you arrived so quickly, I assume you
must not have=
 come from very far. I hope this weather is not always
like today. I mean, =
it's not everyobody who's got the chance of being
stainless! I'm Doc, pleas=
ed to meet you!

He offered his hand.
